chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (n m : nat) (l1 l2 : Vector.t (naryFunc n) m) (f1 f2 : naryFunc m), extEqualVector n m l1 l2 -> extEqual m f1 f2 -> extEqual n (evalComposeFunc n m l1 f1) (evalComposeFunc n m l2 f2)

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
naryFunc = fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end : nat -> Set Arguments naryFunc _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, t A n -> Type), P 0 (nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : t A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, t A n -> Prop), P 0 (nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : t A n), P
evalComposeFunc : forall n m : nat, Vector.t (naryFunc n) m -> naryFunc m -> naryFunc n
extEqualVector : forall n m : nat, Vector.t (naryFunc n) m -> Vector.t (naryFunc n) m -> Prop
extEqual : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc n -> Prop
extEqualOneParamList : forall (n m : nat) (l1 l2 : Vector.t (naryFunc (S n)) m) (c : nat), extEqualVector (S n) m l1 l2 -> extEqualVector n m (evalOneParamList n m c l1) (evalOneParamList n m c l2)
extEqualVectorRefl : forall (n m : nat) (l : Vector.t (naryFunc n) m), extEqualVector n m l l
extEqualTrans : forall (n : nat) (a b c : naryFunc n), extEqual n a b -> extEqual n b c -> extEqual n a c
extEqualSym : forall (n : nat) (a b : naryFunc n), extEqual n a b -> extEqual n b a
evalOneParamList : forall n m : nat, nat -> Vector.t (naryFunc (S n)) m -> Vector.t (naryFunc n) m
extEqualVectorGeneral : forall n m : nat, Vector.t (naryFunc n) m -> forall m' : nat, Vector.t (naryFunc n) m' -> Prop
evalPrimRecs : forall n m : nat, PrimRecs n m -> Vector.t (naryFunc n) m
extEqualRefl : forall (n : nat) (a : naryFunc n), extEqual n a a
evalProjFunc : forall n m : nat, m < n -> naryFunc n
VectorDef.In_sind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> SProp), (forall (m : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P (S m) (VectorDef.cons A a m v)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.In a v -> P m v -> P (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), VectorDef.In a t -> P n t
VectorDef.In_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop), (forall (m : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P (S m) (VectorDef.cons A a m v)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.In a v -> P m v -> P (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), VectorDef.In a t -> P n t
VectorDef.Exists2_sind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t B n -> SProp), (forall (m : nat) (x1 : A) (x2 : B) (v1 : VectorDef.t A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t B m), P x1 x2 -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons B x2 m v2)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x1 : A) (x2 : B) (v1 : VectorDef.t A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t B m), VectorDef.Exists2 P v1 v2 -> P0 m v1 v2 -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons B x2 m v2)) ->...-> P0 n t t0
VectorDef.Exists2_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t B n -> Prop), (forall (m : nat) (x1 : A) (x2 : B) (v1 : VectorDef.t A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t B m), P x1 x2 -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons B x2 m v2)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x1 : A) (x2 : B) (v1 : VectorDef.t A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t B m), VectorDef.Exists2 P v1 v2 -> P0 m v1 v2 -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons B x2 m v2)) ->...-> P0 n t t0
VectorDef.Exists_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop), (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P x -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.Exists P v -> P0 m v -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), VectorDef.Exists P t -> P0 n t
VectorDef.Exists_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> SProp), (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P x -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.Exists P v -> P0 m v -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), VectorDef.Exists P t -> P0 n t
minus_Sn_m : forall n m : nat, m <= n -> S (n - m) = S n - m
Inductive PrimRec : nat -> Set := succFunc : PrimRec 1 | zeroFunc : PrimRec 0 | projFunc : forall n m : nat, m < n -> PrimRec n | composeFunc : forall n m : nat, PrimRecs n m -> PrimRec m -> PrimRec n | primRecFunc : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> PrimRec (S (S n)) -> PrimRec (S n) with PrimRecs : nat -> nat -> Set := PRnil : forall n : nat, PrimRecs n 0 | PRcons : forall n m : nat, PrimRec n -> PrimRecs n m -> PrimRecs n (S m) Arguments PrimRec _%nat_scope Arguments projFunc (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments composeFunc (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments primRecFunc _%nat_scope Arguments PrimRecs (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments PRnil _%nat_scope Arguments PRcons (_ _)%nat_scope
VectorDef.Forall2_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t B n -> Prop), P0 0 (VectorDef.nil A) (VectorDef.nil B) -> (forall (m : nat) (x1 : A) (x2 : B) (v1 : VectorDef.t A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t B m), P x1 x2 -> VectorDef.Forall2 P v1 v2 -> P0 m v1 v2 -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons B x2 m v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n) (t0 : VectorDef.t B n), VectorDef.Forall2 P t t0 -> P0 n t t0
VectorDef.Forall2_sind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t B n -> SProp), P0 0 (VectorDef.nil A) (VectorDef.nil B) -> (forall (m : nat) (x1 : A) (x2 : B) (v1 : VectorDef.t A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t B m), P x1 x2 -> VectorDef.Forall2 P v1 v2 -> P0 m v1 v2 -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons B x2 m v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n) (t0 : VectorDef.t B n), VectorDef.Forall2 P t t0 -> P0 n t t0
Nat.sub_lt : forall n m : nat, m <= n -> 0 < m -> n - m < n
Inductive le (n : nat) : nat -> Prop := le_n : n <= n | le_S : forall m : nat, n <= m -> n <= S m Arguments le (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments le_n _%nat_scope Arguments le_S (_ _)%nat_scope
compose2 : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc (S n) -> naryFunc n
le_lt_or_eq : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> n < m \/ n = m
Nat.max_l : forall n m : nat, m <= n -> Nat.max n m = n
Inductive Exists2 (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t B n -> Prop := Exists2_cons_hd : forall (m : nat) (x1 : A) (x2 : B) (v1 : VectorDef.t A m) (v2 : VectorDef.t B m), P x1 x2 ->...-> VectorDef.Exists2 P (VectorDef.cons A x1 m v1) (VectorDef.cons B x2 m v2) Arguments VectorDef.Exists2 {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope {n}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Exists2_cons_hd {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope {m}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Exists2_cons_tl {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope {m}%nat_scope
evalList : forall m : nat, Vector.t nat m -> naryFunc m -> nat
Nat.max_r : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> Nat.max n m = m
Nat.lt_le_incl : forall n m : nat, n < m -> n <= m
Nat.lt_le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p
Nat.le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m <= p -> n <= p
Nat.shiftl_spec_low : forall a n m : nat, m < n -> Nat.testbit (Nat.shiftl a n) m = false
lt_n_Sm_le : forall n m : nat, n < S m -> n <= m
gt_le_S : forall n m : nat, m > n -> S n <= m
le_S_n : forall n m : nat, S n <= S m -> n <= m
lt_S_n : forall n m : nat, S n < S m -> n < m
Nat.shiftl_spec_high' : forall a n m : nat, n <= m -> Nat.testbit (Nat.shiftl a n) m = Nat.testbit a (m - n)
Nat.add_sub_eq_nz : forall n m p : nat, p <> 0 -> n - m = p -> m + p = n
Nat.max_le_compat_l : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> Nat.max p n <= Nat.max p m
Nat.add_le_lt_mono : forall n m p q : nat, n <= m -> p < q -> n + p < m + q
plus_le_lt_compat : forall n m p q : nat, n <= m -> p < q -> n + p < m + q

```coq
intros.
unfold evalComposeFunc.
intros H1 H2.
rewrite H1, H2.
reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros. unfold evalComposeFunc. intros H1 H2. rewrite H1, H2. reflexivity.
